channel.title: How do i make npc talk?
channel.description: i am wanting to know where to go when i spawn an npc in folder auto spawn where do i go after that to make the same npc talk??

item.title: How do i make npc talk?
item.dc:creator: @bluurr bluurr
item.description:
@bluurr wrote:

ok in npchandler.java search for (moo)

then add

if (npcs[i].npcType == ADD NPC ID HERE) {
if (misc.random2(50) >= 17) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = "ADD WHAT YOU WANT NPC TO SAY";
	}
				}

im at school so this was what i could remmber hope it helps

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make npc talk?
